trans-unit.source: When user authentication is turned on, a connection request must provide a valid user name and password.

seg-source.mrk: When user authentication is turned on, a connection request must provide a valid user name and password.

target.mrk: When user authentication is turned on, a connection request must provide a valid user name and password.

trans-unit.source: uses the type of user authentication specified with the derby.authentication.provider property.

seg-source.mrk: uses the type of user authentication specified with the derby.authentication.provider property.

target.mrk: uses the type of user authentication specified with the derby.authentication.provider property.

trans-unit.source: If the derby.authentication.provider property specifies NATIVE authentication, behaves as if derby.connection.requireAuthentication were set to TRUE, regardless of how derby.connection.requireAuthentication has been set by other means.

seg-source.mrk: If the derby.authentication.provider property specifies NATIVE authentication, behaves as if derby.connection.requireAuthentication were set to TRUE, regardless of how derby.connection.requireAuthentication has been set by other means.

target.mrk: If the derby.authentication.provider property specifies NATIVE authentication, behaves as if derby.connection.requireAuthentication were set to TRUE, regardless of how derby.connection.requireAuthentication has been set by other means.

trans-unit.source: For more information about user authentication, see "Working with user authentication" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>.

seg-source.mrk: For more information about user authentication, see "Working with user authentication" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>.

target.mrk: For more information about user authentication, see "Working with user authentication" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: By default, no user authentication is required.

seg-source.mrk: By default, no user authentication is required.

target.mrk: By default, no user authentication is required.

trans-unit.source: -- system-wide property derby.connection.requireAuthentication=true -- database-wide property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.connection.requireAuthentication', 'true')

seg-source.mrk: -- system-wide property derby.connection.requireAuthentication=true -- database-wide property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.connection.requireAuthentication', 'true')

target.mrk: -- system-wide property derby.connection.requireAuthentication=true -- database-wide property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.connection.requireAuthentication', 'true')

trans-unit.source: Static. For system-wide properties, you must reboot <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for the change to take effect. For database-wide properties, you must reboot the database for the change to take effect.

seg-source.mrk: For system-wide properties, you must reboot <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for the change to take effect.
For database-wide properties, you must reboot the database for the change to take effect.

target.mrk: For system-wide properties, you must reboot <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> for the change to take effect.
For database-wide properties, you must reboot the database for the change to take effect.
